definition: University of Science and Engineering/also sometimes Institute of Technology
texture/grain (of wood)/inner essence/intrinsic order/reason/logic/truth/science/natural science (esp. physics)/to manage/to pay attention to/to run (affairs)/to handle/to put in order/to tidy up
big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

definition: Nanjing University of Science and Technology

Nan2 yang2 Li3 gong1 Da4 xue2

sentences.english: There's an air of menace outside the Polytechnic.
sentences.chinese: 在理工大學之外，似乎瀰漫着一種威脅的空氣。

sentences.english: And clashes erupted once again outside the Polytechnic.
sentences.chinese: 此外，在理工大學牆外又一次爆發衝突。

sentences.english: Denise Keele Bedford, Australian, Master of Fine Arts of Royal Melbourne Institute of Technology.
sentences.chinese: 德妮絲，澳大利亞人，皇家墨爾本理工大學美術碩士。

sentences.english: This paper specifies the self-developed WEB-based VR Revealing System of Chengdu University of Technology and discusses mainly …
sentences.chinese: 重點討論了成都理工大學校園仿真系統的設計與實現。

sentences.english: Can the English culture in NTU be regarded as a true continuation of NU?
sentences.chinese: 南洋理工大學裏的西洋文化可成爲南大的續辦嗎？

sentences.english: Dacheng Tao, Nanyang Technological University, Singapore.
sentences.chinese: 大成道，南洋理工大學，新加坡。

sentences.english: The Innovation Centre of NTU is where they established a business.
sentences.chinese: 南洋理工大學的創意園是兩位大男生創業的起點。

sentences.english: A bunch of Caltech undergrads, that's who.
sentences.chinese: 不過，加州理工大學的一些大學生卻願意這樣做。

sentences.english: She'd never dreamed Bryce would give up his career at Texas Tech.
sentences.chinese: 她從未想到布賴斯會放棄在得州理工大學的工作。

sentences.english: The technology mansion of Changchun Science and Engineering University is a high-rise building of double-tower connecting.
sentences.chinese: 長春理工大學科技大廈爲雙塔連體高層建築。

definition: Tsinghua or Qinghua University, Beijing/National Tsing Hua University, Hsinchu, Taiwan
Fu Jen Catholic University of Peking (from 1925), forerunner of Beijing Normal University 北京師範大學|北京师范大学/Fu Jen Catholic University in New Taipei City, Taiwan
Jinan University in Guangdong Province, with 4 campuses in Guangzhou, Shenzhen and Zhuhai
Sun Yat-sen University (Guangzhou)/Sun Yat-sen University (Kaohsiung)/Sun Yat-sen University (Moscow), founded in 1925 as training ground for Chinese communists
